website_summaries.verdict: A good starting-point smoker that doesn't take up much space and comes at a good price.
pros: Great for tailgating, camping, or small spaces like balconies
Weighs only about 20 pounds without the propane tank
Small size makes this smoker easy to use
cons: You may need more than one propane tank to finish your meat

customer_reviews.title: All in all I am very satisfied with this product and I sure like the portability ...
customer_reviews.text: First time smoker owner. Bought for camping. Brisket cooked for 5 1/2 hrs. Took 3 tanks in all to finish cooking. Had to note when heat dropping enable to start new tank. Recently bought attachment to run off larger tank so that issue is taken care of. Next issue was the smoke wood chips. They seemed to run out sooner than what I hoped they would so I purchased separate wood chip holder and that takes care of that issue. All in all I am very satisfied with this product and I sure like the portability and ease of use to use at home or tailgating or camping. Very satisfied with my new smoker.
customer_reviews.author: Dad

customer_reviews.title: Hreay smoker
customer_reviews.text: This little smoker is great. Did an 8lb pork butt in 6.5 hours and was perfect. My only complaint is the wood box is so small. Had to replace chips every 45 min. That's a pain but not enough to not use it. That's the only reason for the 4 stars instead of five.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer oliver

customer_reviews.title: Great little smoker
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little smoker. Since recieving it last week I have made a delicious pulled pork and a smoked lamb. The temperature was pretty easy to keep track of (has a display on the front)and stayed pretty steady for the whole cooking time. I do recommend upgrading to a full size propane tank and nozzle, it takes 2 of the small ones to smoke meat for a full 8 hours. You have to remember to keep checking it otherwise. Its small, but big enough to accommodate a whole pork and a rack of ribs.
customer_reviews.author: Wishfire

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for small jobs
customer_reviews.text: Nice size for traveling. Great addition to our other propane items, stove, grill and lantern. We use a "lantern tree" adapter attached to our 20# tank, with separate hoses going to each item. It will heat well, if you adjust the damper in the back. As far as "flare-ups" we put a "Weber" drip pan above the burner, and between the water pan, chip box. Be advised, that this smoker does not have a "door seal", so smoke containment, could be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Tripod

customer_reviews.title: Great lil smoker
customer_reviews.text: Great smoker. I have a Masterbuilt Pro that I love. Everything that I put in it came out great. I bought this portable smoker to carry in my RV and use when I go camping. Works great. I hook it up to my propane on the RV. I bought the adapter and the carrying case. The carrying case is very well made and should last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: William Lohrke

customer_reviews.title: It cooks and smokes nicely. Would have given this five stars except that ...
customer_reviews.text: It is well made and very portable. It cooks and smokes nicely. Would have given this five stars except that the chips are used up and done producing smoke after about fifteen minutes. Then you must open the door to remove the ashes and add more chips, letting out the heat, repeat, repeat. Still a good product and would recommend it for portable use.
customer_reviews.author: Arragon

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, fast to assemble and disassemble
customer_reviews.text: Convenient portable smoker. I've used it to bake and reheat while camping by not adding chips. Cooks a little hot and uneven, but common with direct fire gas smokers. Wife uses it without me, no chance that would happen with my charcoal smoker.
customer_reviews.author: D. S.

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size for small patio and party of ...
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size for small patio and party of two! Smoked veggies and salmon! Relish!!! Plan to use for tailgating later in the year and wanted to try it out!
customer_reviews.author: Natural Abundance

customer_reviews.title: Works just as good as my neighbor's $300 smoker
customer_reviews.text: Works just as good as my neighbor's $300 smoker. I cook everything in aluminum tins (can buy in bulk on Amazon) so the inside does not get messy (makes it easier to take camping). You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G. Crupi

customer_reviews.title: Nice Unit
customer_reviews.text: This smoker is perfect for the RVer. Compact size makes it easy to store while on the road and sets up quick when you arrive at your destination. Low temp setting had the box at about 235o which is perfect for typical BBQ meats. You could also use this unit as an oven by not adding wood chips. So far no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Smoke on the Water
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for camping. Gotta learn how to become a better "smoker" but time will take care of that. What I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle Lovell

customer_reviews.title: This smoker is kick ass for Beef Jerky
customer_reviews.text: For the money this smoker is kick ass!. With the regulator and vent I was able to maintain a consistent 180F in the smoker at 54F outside temp with the regulator at low for 4 hours. I love beef Jerky and this thing is the best!!! Recommend not soaking wood chips at this temp though. My first attempt didn't create much smoke but still came out fantastic :)
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Vandehey

customer_reviews.title: Good smoker
customer_reviews.text: Great little smoker. Watch out if you do the warehouse return deal. The item had a piece that was welded wrong and I had to wait a couple of weeks to get the part from the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: CVK

customer_reviews.title: Worst Assembly Instructions I've Ever Seen
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice piece of machinery and it works quite well (so long as you read the other reviews of getting a bigger wood box and a bigger water pan) but the assembly instructions are hog-poo lousy. I know they are writing instructions for three languages, but drawn pictures with no words don't hold a candle to actual photographs with short written instructions in three languages.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my bf, he loves it. It's perfect for camping or even use on our small back yard patio. Easy to use, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Brown

customer_reviews.title: Too small for practical use.
customer_reviews.text: Its portable and all but you will change those wood chips every 10 min because the tray is tiny.
customer_reviews.author: J-Reezy and the Wife

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: Works well, though it runs a little hot at the lowest setting. Size is adequate for a family of four. The optional carrying case is a must for travelling.
customer_reviews.author: og

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my husband to take camping and ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband to take camping and he absolutely loves it. We've helped sell about 3 others to family members.
customer_reviews.author: S. Shryock

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying
customer_reviews.text: This is a great smoker for traveling! It’s not that heavy and easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice little smoker
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this thing is great. The only reason it’s 4 star is it can be difficult to keep the temp at 250 and the little wood chip box doesn’t hold enough. To keep it from blowing out when it was really windy (20 mph with 35 mph gusts) I used tin foil and clothes pins around the legs to block the wind from blowing under the smoker and it stayed lit with no problem. I’ve used this about 6 times in the last two weeks and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Applebee

customer_reviews.title: Will not stay lit.
customer_reviews.text: Blows out in the most gentle breeze. Has almost no temp control. In order to produce smoke it has to be on high. On high the temp climbs to almost 300. Too small to fit anything in. Chip tray lasts 30 minutes. You have to baby sit it the whole time because it blows out and the temp goes too high. Piece of trash.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Waller

customer_reviews.title: Buy a Traeger
customer_reviews.text: Used 5 Times stopped working, so i paid about $20 per use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Works fine although a bit hot even on lowest heat setting.
customer_reviews.author: Fromeous

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Smoker
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking into smoking meats, this is a great starting point. It's not too big so you can learn your temperature control and when and how to change out the wood chips. Just attach the propane and start cooking! You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Keagan

customer_reviews.title: Good Smoker.  Glad I Purchased.
customer_reviews.text: It's just me and my wife so I dont need much. This smoker is really nice for a guy like me. I can smoke at home sometimes and take camping to slow cook and flavor our meats while we hang out.
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: like them.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 as gifts. So far the individuals we gave them to, like them.
customer_reviews.author: Petartist8

customer_reviews.title: Would be great for s single guy
customer_reviews.text: Would be great for s single guy. I used this one for the beach. I made a med sized Boston butt worked just fine. At first I was worried that it would be difficult to control because of the size and that it would be a constant filling of water and wood chips but it wasn't any more work then my large smoker.
customer_reviews.author: Special Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for camping or out on the patio. Small compact size is great.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry from Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Works great too!
customer_reviews.text: Product was as advertised, arrived in a timely manner, and was well packaged for shipment. Works great too!
customer_reviews.author: Keith C. Curran

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to take when camping. Bought the Amazon suggested hook up and hose and everything worked great. The heat was a tad high but it was very hot out that weekend so I'm sure with using it more i will figure it all out. Worked exactly like expected.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my stepdad and he was thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Feke

customer_reviews.title: Great for small cookouts.
customer_reviews.text: Great little smoker but a hounds breath from ten feet away will blow out the burner.
customer_reviews.author: low pressure

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great and is just the right size for camping
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Smoker
customer_reviews.text: Love this smoker!! Have made some awesome chicken, meatloaf and polish sausage. Use it on our camping trips
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Not bad. used several times
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. used several times. wind can be a slight issue. but otherwise it works great. took a little time to get the temperature set right, but once i got the sweet spot it did real good. Size works well for packing in the bed of a truck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Smoker
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little smoker! Works like a champ and fits in the storage bay of my motorhome. I can now smoke ribs, chicken, whatever while enjoying my RV anywhere I go. Highly recommend this unit to anyone who likes to slow smoke meat away from home. It works great at home, also! Get the adaptor hose and connector and hook up to your 20 lb LP bottle.
customer_reviews.author: MS Chief

customer_reviews.title: Thank you very good eating now can't talk
customer_reviews.text: Very good speacial adapter hose baby q for 20 gal is a must buy a very good easy to smoke smoker
customer_reviews.author: ray

customer_reviews.title: We take this camping with us and it works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: We take this camping with us and it works like a charm. Bought the Masterbuilt 20080116 Portable Smoker Carrying Bag as well and it fits perfectly. If you have/buy this smoker, I would recommend for easy containment and carry.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Good smoker
customer_reviews.text: For it being my first time smoking anything this worked great. The smoker box died out in about an hour on low heat, which temp wise stays about 230-240. 2-1/2 hours for a 2lb tri tip.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.text: 0 stars. Still on the fence with this. Charred my 1st rack of ribs. Smoke was fine. Fire started from grease so it's a poor design. Will have to Gerry-rig so grease doesn't catch fire. Maybe another pan. I bought because it's portable that's why it got stars at all. ****UPDATE***** ZERO Stars. Piece of Junk sending back to seller. Will not stay lit ..no breeze!
customer_reviews.author: Jack "LA" Lane

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: Not as heavy duty as we expected but still functional
customer_reviews.author: richard kinnison

customer_reviews.title: Great little travel smoker!
customer_reviews.text: Great little travel smoker! Keeps temperature perfect. It’s my go to for quick meals and great taste.
customer_reviews.author: JOSH

customer_reviews.title: A great little smoker
customer_reviews.text: A great little smoker, but hard to get the temp below 240 degrees. Just the right size for singles, or couples. I wish there was a floor stand for it.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur G.

customer_reviews.title: No assembly instructions
customer_reviews.text: There were assembly instructions and was on hold for 20 min.
customer_reviews.author: Don Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Stay away!!! Won’t come up to temp.
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this a a Christmas present for me and it has never worked properly as it never gets hot enough to stay in the safe zone. I gave it the benefit of doubt thinking it was just to cold, but even at 55 degrees outside it still never even made it to 200 degrees. It certainly can’t be used for tailgating as advertised, and now because I waited for warmer days it’s outside of my return window and we are out our money. I’m so bummed!
customer_reviews.author: Mike & Tina Jones

customer_reviews.title: No instructions!
customer_reviews.text: Have no idea how it works...came with no instructions for putting it together, or cooking with it. Very annoyed!
customer_reviews.author: Dinah

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it, would be nice to have it a little bit bigger
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Barnes

product_meta.title: Masterbuilt 20050116 Patio-2-Portable Propane Smoker, Black
product_meta.description: The Portable Propane Smoker by Masterbuilt is perfect for smoking at home or on-the-go. There's room to smoke a whole a turkey or ham, slabs of ribs, or your favorite BBQ for tailgating. This portable smoker is ideal for camping or road trips. Masterbuilt has made smoking simple. And portable. Troubleshoot-burner does not light after pressing ignitor button caused by low or no gas flow or vapor lock at coupling nut to lp cylinder can be fixed by turning burner control and gas cylinder valve knob to off. Disconnect regulator from cylinder to relieve vapor lock. Reconnect and slightly open the gas cylinder valve slowly and then open further by turning one full turn. Now its connected turn the burner control knob to high and light with ignitor
feature_bullets: Push-button ignition lights burner quickly and easily
Regulator knob adjusts flame for desired temperature
Air damper for moisture, temperature, and Smoke control
Legs fold under for transport and storage
Wood chip tray slides out for easy ash removal
Water bowl to add moisture and flavor
Removable grease tray catches food drippings

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars129 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
